location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 2 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Charles Norris, Secretary to Government, General Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the decision of the Government of Bombay regarding the exportation of Opium to Dutch settlements in India, and reporting that the Opium which was being shipped on board the Issyhad been relanded at Bushire prior to its departure owing to concerns over the illegality of the traffic in Opium.
